## Bio

I’m a senior scientist, working at [Trailhead Biosystems Inc.](https://trailbio.com) In my current role as the director of informatics, I sphearhead THB's the bioinformatics wing where we work on implementing cutting edge transcriptomics technologies, quality control of our products, next generation sequencing pipelines and workflows. 

I am passionate about AI and ML and its applications and use in biology and medicine.

I previously worked as a bioinformatics scientist [at Dr. Mukesh Jain's lab](https://biomedical.brown.edu/people/mukesh-k-jain-md), bioinformatics postdoc fellow [at Dr. Charis Eng's lab](https://www.lerner.ccf.org/genomic-medicine/eng/#lab-investigator), bioinformatics engineer [at Remy Burcelin's lab](https://www.i2mc.inserm.fr/personne/remy-burcelin/).
